detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract MoonFire (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonFire.sol#73-182) has payable functions:
	 - MoonFire.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonFire.sol#84-86)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
